name: WonderHero [OLD]
description: WonderHero is a Play to Earn Mobile RPG game, where gamers can earn rare NFTs (non-fungible token) and sell them on a peer-to-peer marketplace. The team believes in forming a balanced universe where players of different levels can provide each other income opportunities while having fun at the same time. WonderHero is led by a stellar team with leadership experience operating in a Top 20 crypto exchange and over 10 years of combined experience in gaming.
